text:
C. Vijaya Baskar, Minister for Health, declared open the veterinary health sub-centre at Mettupatti near here on Wednesday. He said that this was one of the nine sub-centres sanctioned for the district during the current financial year.

The centres would come up in Iluppur, Pudukottai and Aranthangi blocks, he added. He appealed to the livestock owners to utilise the centres for their cattle health. Collector S. Ganesh presided over the function.

Special gram sabha

on February 23

A special grama sabha will be held at village panchayats in the district on February 23, said Collector S. Ganesh.

In a release issued here on Wednesday, he said that the electoral roll of voters will also be released at the offices of the Revenue Divisional Officers and Taluk offices on February 22. The Collector has appealed to voters to verify their names and avoid duplicate entries.
title: Minister declares open veterinary centre
